Entries.companionAccepted: Oh, okay. Let's go I guess.
Entries.companionDismissAuto: I'll be going home now. Bye.
Entries.companion_Farm: Your farm looks nice, @.$h#$b#I like how hardworking you are.
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Do you need help around here?#$b#I can help you if you want.#$b#But only after I do my house chores first though.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Grown-ups say you shouldn't stay out in the rain for too long or else you get sick.#$b#I don't want my friends getting sick, so take care! Okay?$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: The farm looks lonely in this season, huh?#$b#But I bet you have animals to keep it company.$h#$b#For me, I think that's nice.
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: Crops in the spring are tasty.$h#$b#I always like cooking spring crops for my brother when he's feeling down.$h#$b#I hope he's cheered up when I do, though.
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: I wonder if I can buy some cold juice later before I get back home.#$b#So that if ever anyone needs it, it's there.$h#$b#Oh! You can always tell me if you want one too. I can drop you some.
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: I always see Keahi and Trinnie play around piles of leaves.#$b#They make such a mess, but it seems like they're having fun though.
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: Before my father left for work, we would always build a snowman in our lawn.$h#$b#Once we made something so big my big brother thought it was a monster!$h
Entries.companion_Town: Even if Pelican Town is a bit far, I still like coming here.#$b#It's nice.$h#$b#The people are too!$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: Can we check on my big brother when we pass by my house?#$b#I just want to make sure he's fine.
I once saw Mr. Sonny bring a basket full of fruits to the ridge.#$b#Maybe he went out for a picnic?#$b#It's not my business to eavesdrop though. Mother said that's bad.
Entries.companionSuggest: Hey, so... Can I tag along with you today?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
